messages.title: Kingsway Medical Centre
messages.content: Bill Fisher is fighting for a fairer deal for local people in Burnage and would be proud to represent you. Bill and John are delighted that the new Kingsway Medical Centre is being built at last. We are also campaigning to get the City council to renew the pavements around the new centre to make it safer for pedestrians.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support for the construction of the new Kingsway Medical Centre and improvement of local infrastructure around the centre for pedestrian safety.

issues.health: Support for the construction of the new Kingsway Medical Centre and campaigning for the renewal of pavements around the centre.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fighting for a fairer deal for local people in Burnage.

quotes.text: Local people and the Lib Dems never gave up fighting for Tesco to fulfil their promise of a new medical centre.

images.caption: Bill Fisher & John Leech MP with a sign for Kingsway Medical Centre
